**Tender Announcement: RISO- Heavy Equipment Rental with Operators, Debert, NS Area**
=============================================

**Document Reference**: WS4090958937-Doc4091549900
------------------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of heavy equipment rental complete with operators for the various areas of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax.

**Overview**:
------------

The Contracting Authority requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to furnish all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for the provision of heavy equipment rental complete with operators for the various areas of CFB Halifax.

**Scope of Work**:
------------------

* Provide heavy equipment rental complete with operators for various areas of CFB Halifax
* The RISO will be for an initial period of one (1) year with four (4) optional periods of one year each
* The contractor must apply for a Visit Clearance Request (VCR) for each employee to access DND property

**Evaluation Criteria**:
-------------------------

* Lowest Price

**Exclusion Criteria**:
-----------------------

* This solicitation is excluded from the provision of services under the Procurement Appropriation of the Department of Public Works and Government Services Act.

**Tender Documents**:
----------------------

* The tender documents, including this solicitation document, can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.
* A mandatory site visit will be held at CFB Halifax to familiarize bidders with the site and operations.

**Contact Information**:
----------------------

* Contact Sonia Stockman, (SPAC/PSPC) at sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or concerns.

**Closing Date**:
-----------------

July 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time) (EDT)

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details.  _______________________________________________
Sonia Stockman
Public Services and Procurement Canada
